question: Who among the following is best known for working with Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan in N.W.F.P?
explanation: Khurshedbehn Naoroji was the grandÂ·daughter of Dadabhai Naoroji. She is known to have participated in salt satyagraha of 1930. She is best known for working with Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan in N.W.F.P.
